column2: O ye children of God~; bring to the Lord the offspring of rams.

column1: 2 ^ Bring to the Lord glory and honour~; bring to the Lord glory to his name~; adore ye the Lord in his holy court.
3 ^ The voice of the Lord is upon the waters~; the God of majesty hath thundered~; the Lord is upon many waters.
4 ^ The voice of the Lord is in power~; the voice of the Lord in magnificence.
5 ^ The voice of the Lord breaketh the cedars
column2: and the Lord shall break the cedars of Lebanon

column1: 6 ^ and he shall reduce them to pieces
column3: and as the beloved son of unicorns.

column1: 7 ^ The voice of the Lord divideth the flame of fire~;
8 ^ the voice of the Lord shaketh the desert
column2: and the Lord shall shake the desert of Cades.

column1: 9 ^ The voice of the Lord prepareth the stags
column2: and he will discover the thick woods
column3: and in his temple all shall speak his glory.

column1: 10 ^ The Lord maketh the flood to dwell
column2: and the Lord shall sit king for ever.

column1: 11 ^ The Lord will give strength to his people~; the Lord will bless his people with peace.
